name: Heart in the Dark
description:
The story accompanies the alchemist and magic savvy Leonidon on a journey through time.
During a magical ritual, a dimensional gate accidentally opens, and Leonidon is dragged into the portal and lands in a distant future where the machines dominate.
There is a millennia-old conflict where the machines try to change the planet to optimal conditions but nature has its ways to defend itself unfortunately the machines slowly gain the upper hand. But when Leonidon appeared in this dimension, he had to realize that he was the last man of flesh and blood. Then he decided with the last reagents that had been drawn into this dimension to create a sword in a magical ritual that was so powerful that it could free the souls trapped in the machines.
